name: Project Weaponized HUD
description:
You've been banished to the Scrap Labyrinth, a place where all game assets go when they've been scrapped by their developers. Maybe you can exploit the buggy, incomplete HUD to make your way out. Made in 3 days by 4 people.

Use A & D to walk and the space bar to jump. Try not to get stuck under the minotaur's arm, it's a soft lock that we've yet to fix.

If the embedded WebGL thing doesn't load, you can just download the game below.
